name: 五项野心量表调查
description: 测量个人野心程度的量表
instructions: 请回答以下5个项目。请诚实作答——没有标准答案！
reference: Moore, R., Hussain, M., Watson, C., Fazeli, P., Marquine, M., Yarns, B., Jeste, D., & Moore, D. (2018). Grit and Ambition are Associated with Better Neurocognitive and Everyday Functioning Among Adults Living with HIV. AIDS and Behavior, 22(10), 3214–3225. https://doi.org/10.1007/s10461-018-2061-1
